title: Bellecliff - 1 Bedroom $900 - Pet Friendly
posting_body: ['The Bellecliff Building is located at 14530 Clifton Boulevard in Lakewood across the street from Lakewood Park.', 'Minutes from Downtown Lakewood, bars, and restaurants.', '15 minutes from Downtown Cleveland, Rock Hall, Browns Stadium, and Battery Park.', '1 Bedroom Info', 'https://youtu.be/2hh0UiU5uAI', 'Rent is $900', '* Photos/videos may be of other units in the building, not the available unit.', 'Features', 'Tenant responsible for electric', 'Landlord pays for heat, water, sewer, trash', 'Laundry in building', 'Air conditioning', 'Secure entry', 'Parking (first come) lot available', 'Parking garage subject to availability', 'Pet Policy: This location accepts cats & dogs, 25 pound weight limit.', '2 pets per unit, $25/pet/month, no pet deposit.', 'Application Process', 'The non refundable application fee is $35 for the first application and $5 for any additional applications, anyone 18 or over who intends to reside in the apartment must submit an application.', 'We accept cash, check, money order, and debit card.', "Applications must be filled out in their entirety and submitted with photo ID and proof of income (last 4 weeks/last 2-4 pay stubs from current job, or if self employed last 3 months of bank statements showing deposits, or if receiving social security this year's letter).", 'Please call', 'show contact info', 'to schedule a tour or for an application.', 'We have several properties in the neighborhood, at AIY Properties we are confident that we have an apartment that fits your budget and preferences.', 'Please contact us at', 'show contact info', 'or <URL>.']
